title: Holly Willoughby basks in sunshine while hitting the beach in the midst of the half-term holidays
text:
Both she and her This Morning co-host Phillip Schofield enjoy the school holidays away from the TV studio.

So Holly Willoughby is naturally keen to make the most off, as she took to Instagram on Friday to share an idyllic snap from a sun-soaked beach during the half term.

The TV icon, 38, snapped a selfie on the shores however did not disclose where she had headed off to, undoubtedly in the company of her husband Dan Baldwin, 44, and their kids Harry, 10, Belle, eight, and Chester, five.

Stunning: Holly Willoughby is naturally keen to make the most off, as she took to Instagram on Friday to share an idyllic snap from a sun-soaked beach during the half term

Holly was glowing in the snap as she beamed into the camera and displayed the stunning backdrop of a setting sun behind her.

Going make-up free, the blonde beauty was glowing while donning the stylish shirt with a floral design and putting on a stunning display.

Fans soon flooded the comments section to lavish praise on Holly and gush over her - as with many of her Instagram snaps.

Her admirers penned: 'Holly I always love you.. Your always looking great x... Beautiful lady... Ah that looks lovely enjoy your half term with your babies xx... Beautiful photo... Your so wonderful... Where is your dress from ... love it!'

Time out: Both she and her This Morning co-host Phillip Schofield enjoy the school holidays away from the TV studio

Happy days: She is undoubtedly in the company of her husband Dan Baldwin, 44, and their kids Harry, 10, Belle, eight, and Chester, five

Holly's trip comes after jokingly displayed her 'ruthless' side when she fat shamed an elderly woman during an upcoming episode of Celebrity Juice.

Although the comments are all in jest, viewers will no doubt be shocked to see Holly insult the woman before making her cry and launching her zimmer frame.

This is all set to occur during the 'diva challenge', which was no doubt held in honour of special guest Gemma Collins - aka The GC - who is known for her diva antics.

Welcoming Holly to the challenge, Keith Lemon says: 'You're going to a VIP launch of a new restaurant and you've got there and someone else has got your outfit on.'

Oops! Holly's trip comes after jokingly displayed her 'ruthless' side when she fat shamed an elderly woman during an upcoming episode of Celebrity Juice

Shocking: Although the comments are all in jest, viewers will no doubt be shocked to see Holly insult the woman before making her cry and launching her zimmer frame

Adding: 'We all know about that pain don't we. Well I don't because nobody has ever got on what I'm wearing.'

A dubious Holly then greets the elderly woman by saying 'hello', before adding 'I can't do this' as she considers what she is going to do during the challenge.

However Love Island Star Maura Higgins who is on Holly's team isn't interested in the star's excuses and tells her that the team need the point.

Holly says to the woman: 'Can I just apologise before what I'm about to do'.
description: The TV icon, 38, snapped a selfie on the shores however did not disclose where she had headed off to, undoubtedly in the company of her husband and their kids
